This villa features a private pool and opens up to views of the garden. It has a separate living and dining area and the kitchen is fully-equipped.

Please note that when booking for 6 guests, you will have access to 3 bedrooms only. The 4th bedroom will be locked. When booking for 7-8 guests you will have access to all 4 bedrooms.

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
The property offers a complimentary airport transfer from 6:00 till 23:00. Guests who wish to utilize the free service are requested to inform the property your expected arrival time at least 48 hours prior to check-in. You can use Special Requests box or contact the property directly. Failure in providing flight details may lead to rejection of service.

===
Upon check in at the hotel, please present the same credit card used when making payment for booking as per hotel policy.

If you present a different credit card from the one used to make payment for your booking, kindly settle the total payment of your reservation on arrival. The full amount of payment already charged will be refunded to the original card.

===
Please note that room rates on 31 December include a gala dinner for 02 adults ( 6 adults for Garden View Villa 3 bed room and 8 adults for Garden View 4 bed room). Extra guests will be charged separately.

Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. One child under 11 years is charged VND 186000  per night when using existing beds.
One child under 12 years is charged VND 600000  per night in an extra bed.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1190000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 8.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Any type of extra bed is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation within 1 day before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
